d002.usage: Take this medication by mouth with or without food as directed by your doctor, usually once daily.
d002.side_effects: Dizziness, lightheadedness, drowsiness, nausea, vomiting, tiredness, excess saliva/drooling, blurred vision, weight gain, constipation, headache, and trouble sleeping may occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, consult your doctor.
